--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2023/0624 b) Date of Occurrence: 15/02/2023
c) Installation Details: Wraith Silent - AC-1928-553 at
Maintenance Hub-X
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 20/02/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Compressor Section d) Main Assembly: Wing Root Starboard
e) Nomenclature: Compressor Section Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-C
g) Part No.: PR-3827-Z5 h) Sl No.: SN-5692-156
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 14/12/2020 l) Date of Removal: 18/02/2023
Pg No: 128 Ln No: 8 Pg No: 123 Ln No: 18
m) Manufacturing Agency: Nexus Avionics Manufacturing n) Date, Month & Year March 2017
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 4345 Hrs / 1614 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 18/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility.
Date: 20/03/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations.
Date: 20/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable.
Date: 22/03/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type.
Date: 23/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
